name: Reflect!
description:
This was made for GCO game Jam.

This is the opposite to pong, your aim is to keep the ball in the middle of the screen and not let it escape. 

This game can be played on mobile but if your going to use a computer we highly recommend you hook up a controller such as an XBOX 1 controller, it really improves the experience.

Controls:

Controller (recommended): Left analogue Stick for left punch and right analogue stick for right punch.

Keyboard: [W] & [S] for left stick and [Up] & [Down] for right stick.

Mobile: Both  sliders move the fists.
